results.content: Nice course! Could teach how to catch errors too!
results.content_html: Nice course! Could teach how to catch errors too!

results.content: This course is very clear with easy to understand instructions!
results.content_html: This course is very clear with easy to understand instructions!

results.content:
The course is good and very simple, for those who want an example on how fetching data from a simple API.
Maybe teaching how can we deploy the application or even increase the number of projects  working with a API a little bit more complex would even worth.

But in general, good for beginners get the idea.
